title: Long-Term Interest Rates
content: For release on delivery   10:00 p.m. EST (7 p.m. PST)   March 1, 2013           Long-Term Interest Rates      Remarks by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at the    Annual Monetary/Macroeconomics Conference:  The Past and Future of Monetary Policy    Sponsored by Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco    San Francisco, California          March 1, 2013
